chatplug.title: ChatPlug: WhatsApp + Altegio Automation
chatplug.tagline: 24/7 booking in Altegio via WhatsApp, with zero scheduling conflicts and full multilingual support.

gallery.heroAlt: ChatPlug — WhatsApp automation integrated with Altegio

chatplug.problem: Salons and barbershops lose revenue every day by not replying to WhatsApp instantly. Keeping staff available 24/7 is unrealistic, and generic chatbots don’t connect to the real calendar — causing double-bookings and frustration.
chatplug.engineeringIntro: We built ChatPlug not as a “chatbot”, but as a real-time synchronization layer between WhatsApp and Altegio, with critical-action validation, multilingual support, and strict tenant isolation with enterprise-grade security.
chatplug.impact: We turned scheduling into a smooth self-service flow: the client picks a slot, the bot confirms it in Altegio and notifies the team — using the business’ existing number, with no extra SIMs.
whatItDoes: Books, confirms, cancels, and reschedules directly in Altegio
Detects language and replies in the client’s language
Syncs services, staff, availability, and pricing
Hands off to a human when needed
Dashboard for message volume and performance
howItWorks: Client picks → ChatPlug confirms in Altegio → team is notified
If out of scope, seamless handoff to a human

integration.title: Deep Integration (Altegio)
integration.description: Real-time read/write: services, pricing, staff, and availability come from Altegio, and appointments are confirmed/canceled directly in the CRM.

multilingual.title: Automatic multilingual support
multilingual.description: AI detects the client’s language and replies natively — ideal for tourist-heavy locations and international audiences.

security.title: Enterprise security
security.description: Credentials and data protected with modern encryption and strict tenant isolation.

security: RLS ensures each business can only see its own data
Critical actions are verified and monitored

tourBooking.title: Tour Booking Chatbot (WhatsApp + n8n)
tourBooking.tagline: 24/7 support and bookings with accurate pricing — based on real variables (boat, season, experience, duration and guests).
tourBooking.galleryAlt: Tour booking chatbot on WhatsApp powered by n8n
tourBooking.problem: Tour and experience companies lose revenue when users ask for price and availability and don’t get an immediate answer. The real challenge isn’t “chatting well” — it’s computing the correct price every time, because it changes by boat, season, experience, duration and number of guests.
tourBooking.engineeringIntro: We designed this system as a reliable agent: instead of throwing a spreadsheet into a prompt, we turned pricing rules into deterministic tools (code) and used AI only to understand intent, collect variables, and drive the conversation.
tourBooking.impact: Users ask for a price on WhatsApp → the bot collects the minimum variables → validates available durations → returns the exact amount and guides the user to booking. Less friction, fewer mistakes, more conversions — without relying on human support.
whatItDoes: Understands intent: pricing, questions, booking, changes
Collects variables (experience, boat, date, guests, duration)
Validates duration availability for that experience/date
Calculates the exact price using the client’s rule set (no guesswork)
Logs leads and conversation into a spreadsheet
howItWorks: Receives a WhatsApp message (text or voice)
Normalizes input and aggregates messages to avoid duplicate replies
Agent guides the flow and collects required variables
Deterministic tools: season check, duration listing, price calculation
Final response is “humanized” and split into WhatsApp-friendly chunks

pillars.title: Zero-guess pricing (deterministic)
pillars.description: Pricing must be exact. Rules become code and the agent only answers when all required variables are present.
bullets: Variables: boat, season, experience, duration, guests
Validation: only allows durations that truly exist

pillars.title: Robust message pipeline
pillars.description: Fixes the classic WhatsApp issue: users send 3 messages and the bot replies 3 times.
bullets: Message aggregation with a wait window

pillars.title: Scalable architecture
pillars.description: Modular, step-based workflow with isolated tools — easy to adapt to other booking businesses.

security: Conversation data can be minimized and stored with controls
Deterministic tools reduce hallucination risk for pricing
Separation of concerns: AI handles dialogue; code handles numbers
